nodes.text: The Alderaanian starship Tantive IV had a first officer leading up to the mission to Tatooine.

During the vessel's stop at Ralltiir during the Imperial subjugation of the planet in 0 BBY, the officer monitored Lord Tion's surveillance system from aboard the vessel, under the orders of Captain Antilles.
The first officer appears in the Star Wars radio drama, aired by NPR in 1981.
